module.name: Filestore
module.changelog: *15.0.3.9* Fixing FREEI-1715 Adding FTP timeout default value *15.0.3.8* FREEPBX-21378 Backups failing due to timeout *15.0.3.7* FREEI-996 Local backup not saved if the backup path is mentioned with quotes. *15.0.3.6* FREEPBX-20737 SSH backup failed after FreePBX 14 -> 15 upgrade *15.0.3.5* FREEI-833 File Store: help text for Local Directory items could be better *15.0.3.4* Bugfix/FREEPBX-20571 getting listcontents method is not implemented *15.0.3.3* Related to FREEPBX-20414: removed $jobid from runRestore() *15.0.3.2* FREEPBX-20065 Backup to Email Fails Due To Alleged File Size Excess *15.0.3.1* Fixing FREEPBX-20011 Editing a Filestore -Email entry is creating the duplicate entry *15.0.2.4* FREEPBX-19655 Fix S3 naming conventions *15.0.2.3* Dont remove old filestores when upgrading *15.0.2.2* Fix ability to add S3 *15.0.2.1* FREEPBX-18248 *15.0.2* Update functionality *15.0.1.10* fixing legacy restore *15.0.1.9* FREEPBX-18729 Fix S3 action and general consistency *15.0.1.8* FREEPBX-18248 Fix delete parameter in edit forms *15.0.1.7* Fixing FREEPBX-18651 *15.0.1.6* FREEPBX-18652 Fix logic on region to match the actual setting *15.0.1.5* FREEPBX-18249 Fix s3 grid delete link *15.0.1.4* Formatting *15.0.1.3* FREEPBX-18244 Add the SFTP library back. *15.0.1.2* FREEPBX-18224 Fix local add button *15.0.1* Stable Release *15.0.1alpha1* Initial release
